Keywords: Cosmic , Phoenix Force , Quiet Council , Ruler , X-Factor , X-Force , X-Men
Real Name: Jean Grey
Team Up
01
TEAM UP: BLACK TOM, BEAST, DOMINO, KID OMEGA, SAGE, WOLVERINE: If 2+ friendly characters are on the map, Marvel Girl and listed friendly characters have, "FREE: If this character occupies hindering terrain, move up to 2 squares." (After revealing forces, you may replace character cards with their alternates. You can't choose a Team Up if your starting characters share a name).
02
TEAM UP: GAMBIT, NAMOR, NIGHTCRAWLER, STORM, TRINARY, WOLVERINE: If 2+ listed friendly characters are on the map, opposing characters who can use Flurry, Blades/Claws/Fangs, Super Senses, or Ranged Combat Expert can't modify a combat value positively by more than 1. (After revealing forces, you may replace character cards with their alternates. You can't choose a Team Up if your starting characters share a name).
03
TEAM UP: CYCLOPS, WOLVERINE: If Marvel Girl and all listed friendly characters are on the map, when they attack and their (final) attack roll includes a [3], after resolutions you may place a die with a [3] on this card if no die was removed from this card this attack. Once per turn, you may replace a die in an attack roll with a die from this card. (After revealing forces, you may replace character cards with their alternates. You can't choose a Team Up if your starting characters share a name.)
04
TEAM UP: X-MEN THEMED TEAM: [After establishing themed teams, if Marvel Girl is part of a listed theme team, you may use the following effect:] When Marvel Girl attacks only characters that can use Mind Control, she modifies attack and damage +2. (After revealing forces, you may replace character cards with their alternates. You can�t choose a Team Up if your starting characters share a name).
Special Powers
TARGETING: Characters
PSYCHIC BACKLASH: Outwit. // When a friendly character with the X-Men keyword is targeted by Outwit, after resolutions roll a d6. [4-6]: Deal the opposing character that used Outwit 1 penetrating damage.
KRAKOAN REVIVAL: For all characters with this trait, when a friendly standard character with the X-Men keyword and a lower point value would be KO'd by an opposing effect, you may instead choose to turn that character to it's starting click (this game) and place them adjacent to a friendly character that can use this trait. If you do, your opponent scores that character and generates a bystander on this card (of their choice) adjacent to any of their characters. Your opponent then scores 10 points for every bystander they generated this game via this trait, regardless of source.

August 12, 2022
Mattlikethepaint
I think Psychic Backlash would be triggered if that power was targeted by enemy Outwit. It's a great power but she still feels overcosted to me.
January 9, 2021
Cyke82
I’m paying a bit more than I’d normally pay for a non-Phoenix Jean Grey, so what am I getting here? Well, Krakoan Revival for one, which will be fun to try out. A deterrent to target friendly X-Men with Outwit, along with her own Outwit, which is solid. RS with an 11 attack makes her a capable secondary attacker. TK to help position, push if you want to get to that EE and Prob click or don’t and use TK next turn to continue to deploy. ESD to make her even harder to hit. Yeah, I like it a lot. The team up card potential only improve upon the piece.
October 27, 2020
pokolo
seems hefty for 80 points... yeah that outwit backlash is interesting but if an opposing character outwits that first then what? gotta play the fast forces Sage with her.
